import { useState } from "react" const AddMovie = () => { const [movie, setMovie] = useState({}) const handleChange = (e) => { const genres = e.target.value.split(',').map(genre => genre.trim().toUpperCase()) setMovie({...movie, Genres: genres}) } return ( <>

Add Movie

setMovie({...movie, Name: e.target.value})}/>
handleChange(e)}/>
setMovie({...movie, Genres: e.target.value})}/>
setMovie({...movie, Premiered: e.target.value})}/>

) } export default AddMovie
